trans-unit.source: An argument of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料之類型 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs" /> 的引數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle navigation events in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示將處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 控制項中巡覽事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventHandler> class represents the method that handles the navigation events <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.PreviousButtonClick>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonClick> for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control and for controls that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventHandler>類別代表的方法可處理導覽事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishButtonClick>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.PreviousButtonClick>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarButtonClick>如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制與控制項的繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制 （例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項)。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
